block.betterarcheology.villager_fossil_t: Its fossilized arms could act as a sort of display
block.betterarcheology.villager_fossil_h: They don't seem to have evolved a lot...
block.betterarcheology.villager_fossil_b: A haunting reminder of a village lost to time
block.betterarcheology.ocelot_fossil_too: Creepers seem to fear them even more than cats
block.betterarcheology.ocelot_fossil_hea: Unlike their descendants, they had long and sharp teeth
block.betterarcheology.ocelot_fossil_bod: It looks less agile but stronger
block.betterarcheology.sheep_fossil_tool: Its horns remind you of Goat Horns. Could it also make a sound?
block.betterarcheology.sheep_fossil_head: That probably made a bigger dent than goats do
block.betterarcheology.chicken_fossil_to: You feel lighter when near it
block.betterarcheology.chicken_fossil_he: Its beak seems larger than the chicken's you're used to
block.betterarcheology.chicken_fossil_bo: Its wings also had sharp claws. They also look like they used to have a longer tail
block.betterarcheology.creeper_fossil_to: It looks even scarier than the real ones...
block.betterarcheology.creeper_fossil_he: This face gave you the shivers enough times already
block.betterarcheology.creeper_fossil_bo: So this is the source of its power!
advancements.artifact.description: Craft an Unidentified Artifact from Shards. Now the identifying begins!
advancements.vase.description: Obtain loot by breaking a vase
advancements.fossiliferous_dirt.descript: Use a Brush on Fossiliferous Dirt to uncover its secrets
advancements.fossil_found.description: Uncover a fossil inside of Fossiliferous Dirt
item.betterarcheology.torrent_totem_desc: Use on land to torrent dash
item.betterarcheology.penetrating_strike: Partially ignores effects of Protection Enchantments
item.betterarcheology.seas_bounty_toolti: Catch a wider variety of treasures from the depths
item.betterarcheology.soaring_winds_tool: Harnesses winds to give a startup-boost when using an Elytra
item.betterarcheology.tunneling_tooltip: Also breaks the Block below the mined block
